data.message: I love the comment section to this. You've got the sjw going on about what if it was a women being objectified and then you've got homophobic people getting mad cause of the gay kid

replies.message: That's not sjws. That's men's rights activists.

You miss the very valid point.  No-one would care about some woman ogling a guy at all. What the problem is that men have been threatened off of ogling woman and advertising media never shows this anywhere. Men are eye candy, stupid or geeks not only that but woman are actively shown to look . Or lazy Woman are smart, beautiful (what ever they look like) and hard working. I ask you to go out and tell me any advert that does not fit this..find me an ad where men are checking out woman in the same way.
I'm struggling to make out what you said.
If it's the thing to do with objectifying men, it happens in all types of adverts to women as well it follows a thing called the male gaze
Joshua I didn't understand a word he said either to be honest I couldn't care less it's an advert fgs
Yer pretty much. I was just bored whilst making dinner yesterday so I made this comment
As I said show me an advert where men do the same to woman
